verses.verse: ה֤וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Ho כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every צָמֵא֙ <S%H6771><s%> every one that thirsteth לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> come לַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> ye to the waters וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> have ל֖וֹ כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and he that hath no money לְכ֤וּ <S%H1980><s%> come שִׁבְרוּ֙ <S%H7666><s%> ye buy וֶֽאֱכֹ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> and eat וּלְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> Come שִׁבְר֗וּ <S%H7666><s%> buy בְּלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Without כֶ֛סֶף <S%H3701><s%> without money וּבְל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> and without מְחִ֖יר <S%H4242><s%> and without price יַ֥יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine וְחָלָֽב׃ <S%H2461><s%> and milk

לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תִשְׁקְלוּ־ <S%H8254><s%> Wherefore do ye spend כֶ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> money בְּֽלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread וִיגִיעֲכֶ֖ם <S%H3018><s%> and your wages בְּל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> for לְשָׂבְעָ֑ה <S%H7654><s%> for [that which] satisfieth שִׁמְע֨וּ <S%H8085><s%> diligently שָׁמ֤וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> carefully אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to me וְאִכְלוּ־ <S%H398><s%> unto me and eat ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> ye [that which is] good וְתִתְעַנַּ֥ג <S%H6026><s%> delight בַּדֶּ֖שֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> itself in fatness נַפְשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H5315><s%> and let your soul

הַטּ֤וּ <S%H5186><s%> Incline אָזְנְכֶם֙ <S%H241><s%> your ear וּלְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> and come אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> unto me hear וּתְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> shall live נַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> and your soul וְאֶכְרְתָ֤ה <S%H3772><s%> and I will make לָכֶם֙ בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> covenant עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> an everlasting חַֽסְדֵ֥י <S%H2617><s%> mercies דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> of David הַנֶּאֱמָנִֽים׃ <S%H539><s%> with you [even] the sure

הֵ֛ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold עֵ֥ד <S%H5707><s%> him [for] a witness לְאוּמִּ֖ים <S%H3816><s%> to the people נְתַתִּ֑יו <S%H5414><s%> Behold I have given נָגִ֥יד <S%H5057><s%> a leader וּמְצַוֵּ֖ה <S%H6680><s%> and commander לְאֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H3816><s%> to the people

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold גּ֤וֹי <S%H1471><s%> a nation לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תֵדַע֙ <S%H3045><s%> [that] thou knowest תִּקְרָ֔א <S%H7121><s%> Behold thou shalt call וְג֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> not and nations לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יְדָע֖וּךָ <S%H3045><s%> [that] knew אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> about יָר֑וּצוּ <S%H7323><s%> not thee shall run לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> Because יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto thee because of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְלִקְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> and for the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for פֵאֲרָֽךְ׃ <S%H6286><s%> for he hath glorified ס

דִּרְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1875><s%> Seek יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> ye the LORD בְּהִמָּצְא֑וֹ <S%H4672><s%> while he may be found קְרָאֻ֖הוּ <S%H7121><s%> call בִּֽהְיוֹת֥וֹ <S%H1961><s%> become קָרֽוֹב׃ <S%H7138><s%> ye upon him while he is near

יַעֲזֹ֤ב <S%H5800><s%> forsake רָשָׁע֙ <S%H7563><s%> Let the wicked דַּרְכּ֔וֹ <S%H1870><s%> his way וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אָ֖וֶן <S%H205><s%> and the unrighteous מַחְשְׁבֹתָ֑יו <S%H4284><s%> his thoughts וְיָשֹׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> and let him return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God וִֽירַחֲמֵ֔הוּ <S%H7355><s%> and he will have mercy וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> upon him and to our God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יַרְבֶּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> for he will abundantly לִסְלֽוֹחַ׃ <S%H5545><s%> pardon

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor מַחְשְׁבוֹתַי֙ <S%H4284><s%> For my thoughts מַחְשְׁב֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4284><s%> [are] not your thoughts וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor דַרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> neither [are] your ways דְּרָכָ֑י <S%H1870><s%> my ways נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָבְה֥וּ <S%H1361><s%> are higher שָׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> For [as] the heavens מֵאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> than the earth כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> So גָּבְה֤וּ <S%H1361><s%> higher דְרָכַי֙ <S%H1870><s%> so are my ways מִדַּרְכֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1870><s%> than your ways וּמַחְשְׁבֹתַ֖י <S%H4284><s%> and my thoughts מִמַּחְשְׁבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H4284><s%> than your thoughts

כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> for כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after יֵרֵד֩ <S%H3381><s%> cometh down הַגֶּ֨שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> For as the rain וְהַשֶּׁ֜לֶג <S%H7950><s%> and the snow מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven וְשָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> there לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָשׁ֔וּב <S%H7725><s%> and returneth כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo הִרְוָ֣ה <S%H7301><s%> not thither but watereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְהוֹלִידָ֖הּ <S%H3205><s%> and maketh it bring forth וְהִצְמִיחָ֑הּ <S%H6779><s%> and bud וְנָ֤תַן <S%H5414><s%> that it may give זֶ֙רַע֙ <S%H2233><s%> seed לַזֹּרֵ֔עַ <S%H2232><s%> to the sower וְלֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> and bread לָאֹכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> to the eater

כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> So יִֽהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become דְבָרִי֙ <S%H1697><s%> So shall my word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> be which יֵצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> be that goeth forth מִפִּ֔י <S%H6310><s%> out of my mouth לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> It will not יָשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> it shall not return אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me רֵיקָ֑ם <S%H7387><s%> unto me void כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> but it shall accomplish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what חָפַ֔צְתִּי <S%H2654><s%> that which I please וְהִצְלִ֖יחַ <S%H6743><s%> and it shall prosper אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which שְׁלַחְתִּֽיו׃ <S%H7971><s%> [in the thing] whereto I sent

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> with בְשִׂמְחָ֣ה <S%H8057><s%> with joy תֵצֵ֔אוּ <S%H3318><s%> For ye shall go out וּבְשָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> with peace תּֽוּבָל֑וּן <S%H2986><s%> and be led forth הֶהָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> the mountains וְהַגְּבָע֗וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and the hills יִפְצְח֤וּ <S%H6476><s%> shall break forth לִפְנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H6440><s%> before רִנָּ֔ה <S%H7440><s%> you into singing וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> and all the trees הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field יִמְחֲאוּ־ <S%H4222><s%> shall clap כָֽף׃ <S%H3709><s%> [their] hands

תַּ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> Instead הַֽנַּעֲצוּץ֙ <S%H5285><s%> Instead of the thorn יַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> shall come up בְר֔וֹשׁ <S%H1265><s%> the fir tree [תַחַת כ] (וְתַ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Instead ק) הַסִּרְפַּ֖ד <S%H5636><s%> and instead of the brier יַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> shall come up הֲדַ֑ס <S%H1918><s%> the myrtle tree וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> and it shall be to the LORD לְשֵׁ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> for a name לְא֥וֹת <S%H226><s%> sign עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> for an everlasting לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִכָּרֵֽת׃ <S%H3772><s%> [that] shall not be cut off ס
